wiki.content:
Originally written by Richard D. James, recording as Aphex Twin; appeared on his 1997 album "Come to Daddy." Covered by The Bad Plus on their major-label debut "These Are The Vistas" (Columbia Records, 2003)
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Originally written by Richard D. James, recording as Aphex Twin; appeared on his 1997 album "Come to Daddy." Covered by The Bad Plus on their major-label debut "These Are The Vistas" (Columbia Records, 2003)

track.name: Flim
comments: Not sure if the Stromberg theme is realy the Bad Plus version, sounds slightly different to me, like another band trying to recreate the Bad Plus Version. Not sure though
better version than the Aphex Twin original!
flim ... better than the original one mr king!
Büro ist wie Jazz. Nur ohne die Musik.
i love this song, but it seriously reminds me of the build mode in the sims. not a bad thing
Other album version is a little better, but this is a phenomenal song.
love the intro. love all of it.
Dance Baby thats cool jaaaaazzzzz !!!!!!!! absolut leiwand
